name: Space Trails
description:
Space Trails is a fast paced ball roller arcade game with a retro inspired art and sound style.

This is a prototype made during a Unity3d course. The game is in early development and I'm looking to get feedback on my work. Currently the first build is uploaded and I would appreciate general feedback on:

  • Core gameplay mechanics
  • Controls
  • Camera position

More levels, final art etc. will be added when the gameplay core is set. I will keep posting updates of the game here. Please leave feedback in comments below, thanks! <3
